Uses of Class
game.Obstacle

  • Packages that use Obstacle 
    Package Description
    game  

    • Uses of Obstacle in game

      Methods in game that return Obstacle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Obstacle[][] Level.getObstacles() 
      static Obstacle[][] Obstacle.readConfCsv(int n)
      This function is reading a configuration file and depending on this it creates an array of obstacles with the help of StringToObs
      Methods in game with parameters of type Obstacle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Character.collisionFeet(Obstacle[][] obs, int j, int k)
      This function is testing the collision with the below obstacles, helping Character.collisionUpdate(int, int, int, int)
      boolean Character.collisionHead(Obstacle[][] obs, int i, int j, int k)
      This method is used to know if there is a collision at the head of the character and if yes, put him back in place, helping Character.collisionUpdate(int, int, int, int)
      boolean Character.collisionSide(Obstacle[][] obs, int i, int j, int k, int l)
      This method deals with the left and right collisions that could occur while playing, helping Character.collisionUpdate(int, int, int, int)
      boolean Character.collisionSideHelp(Obstacle[][] obs, int i, int j, int l)
      This method is here to help the function Character.collisionSide(Obstacle[][], int, int, int, int) to factorize some work
